Interface CountryAndDivisionQuery

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddCustomerController
public interface CountryAndDivisionQuery
interface for searching the country and division tables of the database.
Author:
Anthony Collins

  • Method Details

    • convertToAbbreviation

      static String convertToAbbreviation(String divisionFullName)
      This method takes a divisions full name and returns its abbreviation.
      Parameters:
      divisionFullName - is the full name of a state/ province/ or territory.
      Returns:
      the abbreviation for the inputted division.

    • getDivisionName

      static String getDivisionName(String division)
      this method returns a divisions full name based off an abbreviation that is passed in.
      Parameters:
      division - the abbreviation for a state/ territory/ or province.
      Returns:
      full name for the passed in abbreviation.

    • pullDivisonID

      static int pullDivisonID(String divisionIDSearch) throws SQLException
      method searched for a first level divisions ID based on its name.
      Parameters:
      divisionIDSearch - the name of a first level division.
      Returns:
      the ID number for that first level division, if no division ID is found -1 is returned.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • pullDivision

      static String pullDivision(int divisionID) throws SQLException
      method returns full name for a division when a division ID is passed in.
      Parameters:
      divisionID - the ID number for a division.
      Returns:
      the name of the division whose ID was entered.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • pullCountry

      static String pullCountry(int divisionID) throws SQLException
      method returns a countrys name when a division ID is entered.
      Parameters:
      divisionID - the Id number for a division.
      Returns:
      the name of the country to which the division belongs.
      Throws:
      SQLException
